title: WTB: N172 Old Judge Jesse Duryea
author: ternst17

posts.post_title: WTB: N172 Old Judge Jesse Duryea
posts.post_content: I’m looking to buy an N172 Old Judge Jesse Duryea to add to my collection of prewar players from Iowa. I’m interested in any pose. I also have several graded T206 HOFers if interested in a trade.
